txt.en: 'Off with you! I've no time to be bothered by some meddling traveller.'
'Be about your business. I've no time for distractions.'
'Fool dwarves always looking down their noses at our craft.'
'I ask you, if dwarf-smithy is so superior, why am I so busy?'
'If you want to be of help, leave me be. I'm too busy to be bothered.'
'No sooner do I finish the job, than the fool customer changes their mind.'
